鼎.definition: ancient cooking cauldron with two looped handles and three or four legs; pot (dialect); to enter upon a period of (classical); Kangxi radical 206; one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes

鼎力.definition: (honorific) your kind efforts; thanks to your help

鼎力相助.definition: We are most grateful for your valuable assistance.

鼎助.definition: (honorific) your inestimable assistance; thanks to your help

鼎城.definition: Dingcheng district of Changde city 常德市[Chang2 de2 shi4], Hunan

鼎城區.definition: Dingcheng district of Changde city 常德市[Chang2 de2 shi4], Hunan

鼎泰豐.definition: Din Tai Fung, restaurant specializing in dumplings, with stores in many countries

鼎湖.definition: Dinghu District of Zhaoqing City 肇慶市|肇庆市[Zhao4 qing4 Shi4], Guangdong

鼎湖區.definition: Dinghu District of Zhaoqing City 肇慶市|肇庆市[Zhao4 qing4 Shi4], Guangdong

鼎盛期.definition: golden age; heyday; period of peak prosperity

鼎立.definition: lit. to stand like the three legs of a tripod; tripartite confrontation or balance of forces

鼎足.definition: lit. the three legs of a tripod; fig. three competing rivals

鼎足之勢.definition: competition between three rivals; tripartite confrontation

鼎鐺玉石.definition: lit. to use a sacred tripod as cooking pot and jade as ordinary stone (idiom); fig. a waste of precious material; casting pearls before swine

鼎革.definition: change of dynasties; clear out the old, bring in the new
